channel.title: Plurk News - Plurk
channel.description: Plurk News - Plurk - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: We’re launching three brand-new themed campsites ✨ https://www.plurk.com/f/Plurkgeneral (General) – A space share your thoughts, and any topics you...
item.description:
We’re launching three brand-new themed campsites

✨ General – A space share your thoughts, and any topics you love!
✨ Second Life – A hub for SL enthusiasts!
✨ Anime – Love anime? Discuss the latest series, classic favorites, hidden gems, and your collection!
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: Hi, Plurkers! We are opening a limited-time opportunity for Plurk users to apply to create their own topic campsite , gathering like-minded friends in...
item.description:
Hi, Plurkers!
We are opening a limited-time opportunity for Plurk users to apply to create their own topic campsite , gathering like-minded friends interested in specific topics. The application method is listed in the comments.
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: https://images.plurk.com/3r6F4wPzio7YNABIlcweRs.png Meaty is coming to the U.S.! More than a plush toy, Meaty symbolizes your support for the Plurk co...
item.description:
Meaty is coming to the U.S.! More than a plush toy, Meaty symbolizes your support for the Plurk community. At Plurk, we value real connections and a clutter-free experience, where sharing life’s moments matters most. Bring Big Meaty home and help keep our friendly spirit alive!
order here
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: 📢 System Upgrade Notification Plurk will have a scheduled maintenance from 20:30 to 21:30 UTC on Nov 27. Our service may not be available during th...
item.description:
📢 System Upgrade Notification
Plurk will have a scheduled maintenance from 20:30 to 21:30 UTC on Nov 27. Our service may not be available during this time.
We hope to provide you with an even better experience after the upgrade! Thank you for your support and understanding.
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: Hello lovely Plurkers! I have some exciting news to share: we’re planning to create a dedicated space for English speakers! This new campsite will be...
item.description: Hello lovely Plurkers! I have some exciting news to share: we’re planning to create a dedicated space for English speakers! This new campsite will be a place where you can chat and discuss all kinds of topics with fellow Plurkers. The best part? You’ll be able to post up to 1,000 words—no more 360-character limit!
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: Hello Plurkers! As an admin from Taiwan, I’m curious about how you found Plurk and whether you like it. Do you use other social media platforms? Are ...
item.description: Hello Plurkers! As an admin from Taiwan, I’m curious about how you found Plurk and whether you like it. Do you use other social media platforms? Are your IRL friends also on Plurk? Share with me! Meaty and I are eager to know Plurkers around world
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: [emo68] **Important Announcement** [emo68] Dear Plurkers, Thank you for your continued support of Plurk! As part of our commitment to you, we're enhan...
item.description:
Important Announcement

Dear Plurkers,

Thank you for your continued support of Plurk! As part of our commitment to you, we're enhancing our platform's security. In the coming weeks, we'll be asking users to verify their email addresses.

[continued]
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: Hi Plurkies, Recently, we have received many suggestions about increasing the character limit. The good news is, we have discussed the issue of adding...
item.description:
Hi Plurkies,

Recently, we have received many suggestions about increasing the character limit. The good news is, we have discussed the issue of adding the character limit with the development team in detail.
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: Plurk will be updating Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. https://www.plurk.com/terms https://www.plurk.com/privacy We hope to let you know these ch...
item.description:
Plurk will be updating Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.Terms of Service - PlurkPrivacy Policy - PlurkWe hope to let you know these changes before they take effect on 00:00 [UTC+8] April 8th, 2024.

Thank you for using Plurk.
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: **Termination of Twitter Message Syncing** Due to the recent adjustments of Twitter policies, the feature of synchronizing plurks to Twitter will no l...
item.description:
Termination of Twitter Message Syncing

Due to the recent adjustments of Twitter policies, the feature of synchronizing plurks to Twitter will no longer be available starting from 00:00 Sept. 1st, 2023 (UTC).
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: We sometimes get support requests of usability issues about our web, such as: - search is always loading - can not reply or edit response - can not se...
item.description:
We sometimes get support requests of usability issues about our web, such as:

- search is always loading
- can not reply or edit response
- can not see responses while opening plurk in popup window

If you experience the similar issue, please check if you've installed the "PlurkCustom" extension in your browser.
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: **[New Feature] Emoticon Pack** Do you like emoticons? Great news! A brand new Plurk feature - Emoticon Pack is here for you. Now you can install a pa...
item.description:
[New Feature] Emoticon Pack

Do you like emoticons? Great news! A brand new Plurk feature - Emoticon Pack is here for you. Now you can install a pack of emoticons in just one click!

Premium users, enjoy making your own emoticon packs now! Find how:
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: In response to the new national security law in Hong Kong, Plurk has suspended its process for responding to user data requests from Hong Kong authori...
item.description:
In response to the new national security law in Hong Kong, Plurk has suspended its process for responding to user data requests from Hong Kong authorities.

We believe freedom of expression is a fundamental human right and supports the freedom of an individual or a community to articulate their opinions and ideas without fear of retaliation.
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: New Plurk Coin Feature - **Scheduled Posting** Now you can post at a specific time on web version! Never forget to send birthday wishes, greetings, et...
item.description:
New Plurk Coin Feature - Scheduled Posting

Now you can post at a specific time on web version!
Never forget to send birthday wishes, greetings, etc.
Go to your name in the top right and click on 'Settings', You can schedule your post through 'Plurks Manager'.
item.author: Plurk EN

item.title: Plurk has a very special guest this week! One of Plurk founders, Kan, visited Taiwan and Plurk Office recently. He said that he hoped Plurk can be an ...
item.description:
Plurk has a very special guest this week!
One of Plurk founders, Kan, visited Taiwan and Plurk Office recently. He said that he hoped Plurk can be an even stronger social media ten years after and thanked us for running it.
item.author: Plurk EnJoy
